About Me

Let me share a few things...

BIO

Web Developer with experience in management, entrepreneurship and community management like managing fundraisers and drafting new business plans. I am a young professional with a strong entrepreneurial spirit and deep attachment to understanding the intersectionality of human behaviors and technological developments. My love affair with entrepreneurship and technology - from the past until now - all involve studying the past to improve and apply to future endeavors. I want to push the influential and everlasting ripple of technological development.

I completed Coding Boot Camp through the University of Minnesota (Twin Cities) where I expanded my knowledge in web development technologies like CSS, BootStrap, JavaScript, Python, React.js, adds to my artisanal skills.

Walgreens

Assistant Store Manager

  • Developed new solutions for training new hires and increase training efficiency by two-folds.

  • Supervised new marketing campaign to raise funds for Red Nose event by collecting donations from an average of 100 customers per week.

International Office Technologies (IOT)

Front End Developer

  • Developed and implemented new repair procedures and tools, resulting in increase business by three-folds.
